item.title: Roy add a quote by Marilyn French
item.description: "In the beginning was the Mother, the Word began a new era, one we have come to call Patriarchy." -- Marilyn French

item.title: Roy add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "Sometimes we drug ourselves with dreams of new ideasl The head will save us. The brain alone will set us free. But there are no new ideas waiting in the wings to save us as women, as human. There are only old and forgotten ones, new combinations, extrapolations and recognitions from within ourselves--along with the renewed courage to try them out." -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Roy add a quote by Gary Snyder
item.description: "Today we are aware as never before of the plurality of human life-styles and possibilities, while at the same time being tied, like in an old silent movie, to a runaway locomotive rushing headlong toward a very singular catastrophe" -- Gary Snyder
